item.description:
Kerry asked me to setup something for Sunday afternoon. Sorry for the short notice. Anyone interested in seeing Get Smart? Dinner afterwards?

The movie is at 4:20. Let's plan on meeting around 4:00. I hope no one minds meeting at Showcase in Worcester for a change.
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the guy with glasses, goatee, and Superman cap

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Get Smart - 4:20 at Showcase in Worcester
